(73) V. A New and Exact T A B L E, Collected from several Observations, taken in four Voyages to Hudson's Bay in North America from London: Shewing the Variation of the Magnetical Needle, or Sea Compass, in the Path-way to the said Bay, according to the several Latitudes and Longitudes, from the Year 1721, to 1725. By Mr. Christopher Middleton. Lat. Long. Vari. Lat. Long. Vari. D. M. D. M. D. M. D. M. D. M. D. M. 50 00 12 00 14 00 50 00 18 45 17 00 51 00 12 00 14 15 51 00 18 45 17 ~ 52 00 12 00 14 30 52 00 18 45 17 30 53 00 12 00 14 45 53 00 18 45 17 45 54 00 12 00 15 00 54 00 18 45 18 00 55 00 12 00 15 15 55 00 18 45 18 ~ 56 00 12 00 15 30 56 00 18 45 18 30 57 00 12 00 15 45 57 00 18 45 18 45 58 00 12 00 16 00 58 00 18 45 19 00 59 00 12 00 16 15 59 00 18 45 19 ~ 50 00 14 15 15 00 50 00 21 00 18 00 51 00 14 15 15 15 51 00 21 00 18 15 52 00 14 15 15 30 52 00 21 00 18 30 53 00 14 15 15 45 53 00 21 00 18 45 54 00 14 15 16 00 54 00 21 00 19 00 55 00 14 15 16 15 55 00 21 00 19 15 56 00 14 15 16 30 56 00 21 00 19 30 57 00 14 15 16 45 57 00 21 00 19 45 58 00 14 15 17 00 58 00 21 00 20 00 59 00 14 15 17 15 59 00 21 00 20 15 50 00 16 30 16 00 50 00 23 15 19 00 51 00 16 30 16 15 51 00 23 15 19 15 52 00 16 30 16 30 52 00 23 15 19 30 53 00 16 30 16 45 53 00 23 15 19 45 54 00 16 30 17 00 54 00 23 15 20 00 55 00 16 30 17 15 55 00 23 15 20 15 56 00 16 30 17 30 56 00 23 15 20 30 57 00 16 30 17 45 57 00 23 15 20 45 58 00 16 30 18 00 58 00 23 15 21 00 ~ 00 16 30 18 15 59 00 23 15 21 15 (74) Lat. M. 50 00 43 30 28 00 54 00 57 00 33 00 51 00 43 30 28 15 55 00 57 00 33 15 52 00 43 30 28 30 56 00 57 00 33 30 53 00 43 30 28 45 57 00 57 00 33 45 54 00 43 30 29 00 58 00 57 00 34 00 55 00 43 30 29 15 59 00 57 00 34 30 56 00 43 30 29 30 60 00 57 00 35 00 57 00 43 30 29 45 61 00 57 00 35 30 58 00 43 30 30 00 59 00 43 30 30 15 55 00 60 00 34 00 51 00 46 00 29 00 56 00 60 00 34 30 52 00 46 00 29 15 57 00 60 00 35 00 53 00 46 00 29 30 58 00 60 00 35 30 54 00 46 00 29 45 59 00 60 00 36 00 55 00 46 00 30 00 60 00 60 00 36 30 56 00 46 00 30 15 61 00 60 00 37 00 57 00 46 00 30 30 58 00 46 00 30 45 59 00 46 00 31 00 57 00 63 00 35 00 58 00 63 00 35 30 52 00 48 30 30 00 59 00 63 00 36 00 53 00 48 30 30 15 60 00 63 00 36 30 54 00 48 30 30 30 61 00 63 00 37 00 55 00 48 30 30 45 62 00 63 00 37 30 56 00 48 30 31 00 57 00 48 30 31 15 58 00 48 30 31 30 59 00 66 00 37 00 59 00 48 30 31 45 60 00 66 00 37 40 61 00 66 00 38 20 53 00 51 00 31 00 62 00 66 00 39 00 54 00 51 00 31 15 63 00 66 00 39 40 55 00 51 00 31 30 56 00 51 00 31 45 57 00 51 00 32 00 60 00 69 00 41 00 58 00 51 00 32 15 61 00 69 00 41 40 59 00 51 00 32 30 62 00 69 00 42 20 60 00 51 00 32 45 54 00 54 00 32 00 60 00 72 00 40 00 55 00 54 00 32 15 61 00 72 00 42 00 56 00 54 00 32 30 61 40 72 00 42 40 57 00 54 00 32 45 58 00 54 00 33 00 62 00 78 00 43 00 59 00 54 00 33 15 63 00 78 00 44 00 60 00 54 00 33 30 63 50 78 00 46 00 61 00 54 00 33 45 (76) Lat. L o ng Vari. D. M. D. M. D. M. 61 00 75 00 38 00 62 00 75 00 43 00 62 50 75 00 45 00 63 00 81 00 43 00 64 00 81 00 46 00 62 00 82 00 39 00 From Long. 68 Degrees 63 00 82 00 44 00 to 81. is in Hudson's Straits, 61 00 84 00 33 45 where is the greatest Varia62 00 84 00 40 00 tion, and the Compass will 63 00 84 00 42 00 hardly Traverse. 60 00 86 00 30 00 61 00 86 00 33 00 62 00 86 00 35 00 59 00 88 00 28 00 60 00 88 00 28 40 61 00 88 00 29 20 57 00 90 00 24 00 58 00 90 00 24 30 59 00 90 00 25 00 57 00 94 00 23 00 58 00 95 00 22 30 59 00 95 00 21 00 A
